sense.name: introduce people
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent] ACQUAINT NP2[patient] PP{with NP[patient[animate]]}
sense.examples: He addressed her courteously until he acquainted her with himself. Permit me to acquaint you with my son. They acquainted themselves by rubbing noses.

sense.name: Make familiar with, inform
sense.examples: They acquainted him with their plan in all its details. They acquainted him with inhaling of gasoline fumes. They acquainted him of the proceedings. They did entreat me to acquaint her of it. There is an opportunity to acquaint her of the benefits.
